# PHS 7045

The syllabus is available [here](syllabus.md).

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis 
#| warning: false

# Updating syllabus
invisible(file.copy("../syllabus.md", "syllabus.md"))

# List of pages to be rendered
fns <- read.csv("pages.csv")

# Moving the data
for (i in 1:nrow(fns)) {

    # Making sure the path exists
    tryCatch(dir.create(
        dirname(fns$urlpath[i]),
        showWarnings = FALSE,
        recursive = TRUE
        ), error = function(e) e)    

    # Getting the files
    tocopy <- strsplit(fns$copy[i], split = ";")[[1]]
    for (toc in tocopy) {
        if (file.exists(toc))
            file.copy(
                from      = toc,
                to        = file.path(dirname(fns$urlpath[i])),
                recursive = file.info(toc)$isdir[1],
                overwrite = TRUE
                )
    }

    invisible(file.copy(from = fns$path[i], to = fns$urlpath[i], overwrite = TRUE))

    pathto <- fns$urlpath[i]
    if (grepl("index\\.html?$", pathto))
        pathto <- dirname(pathto)

    cat(sprintf("-  %s (<a href=\"%s\" target=\"_blank\">link</a>)\n\n", fns$name[i], pathto))

}
```
